name: Ballance (itch) (CosmoKitten)
description:
Prepare for an amazing adventure with a magical atmosphere, which requires focus, concentration, and timing to pass all the difficulties and get to the goal.

 

In "Ballance" you have to control the platform with the ball, keeping balance, and your mission will be to reach the "black hole" bypassing all obstacles and collecting at least 1 star. With each new level it will become harder and more interesting, and with each chapter you will meet new dangers and obstacles! Colorful and beautiful graphics combined with bewitching sounds and melodies will allow you to completely immerse yourself in a surreal world.

 

Features:

• ⛰️ Levels - many unique levels with different traps.

• 🎨 Graphics - will allow your imagination to come up with your own universe.

• 🔈 Sound - bewitching melodies will help you to completely relax and concentrate on the gameplay.

• 🎮 Controls - you do not have to study for a long time, start to play immediately!

• 🎩 Riddles - you will need not only your agility, but also the intellect to understand how to pass difficult puzzles.

• 🏆 Highscores - collect as many stars as possible and open all levels!

 

Ballance is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.

 

We want to note that we're always reading your feedback and trying to translate all your ideas and wishes into reality. So we'd really appreciate your opinion - what you like or dislike in the game, as well as information on any problems that you notice in the game.
